channel.title: Flexdashboard on Gillian's Data Science Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Flexdashboard on Gillian's Data Science Blog

item.title: Blank Dash Board
item.description: Column Yankee Homerun Total Throughout the Years #extracting the data---------------------------------------- query<-"SELECT yearId,HR FROM Teams WHERE teamID='NYA'" result<-sqldf(query) #visualizing the data---------------------------------------- ggplot()+ geom_line(data=result,aes(x=yearID,y=HR))+ xlab('year')+ ylab('homeruns') Column Chart B Chart C
